channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Statistics -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Statistics -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-25148|2024-08-03T04:29:01.616Z -- wp%20statistics -- wp%20statistics
item.description: The WP Statistics WordPress plugin is vulnerable to SQL Injection due to insufficient escaping and parameterization of the current_page_id parameter found in the ~/includes/class-wp-statistics-hits.php file which allows attackers without authentication to inject arbitrary SQL queries to obtain sensitive information, in versions up to and including 13.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2022-25307|2024-08-03T04:36:06.776Z -- wp%20statistics -- wp%20statistics
item.description: The WP Statistics WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting due to insufficient escaping and sanitization of the platform parameter found in the ~/includes/class-wp-statistics-hits.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts onto several pages that execute when site administrators view a sites statistics, in versions up to and including 13.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2022-25306|2024-08-03T04:36:06.727Z -- wp%20statistics -- wp%20statistics
item.description: The WP Statistics WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting due to insufficient escaping and sanitization of the browser parameter found in the ~/includes/class-wp-statistics-visitor.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts onto several pages that execute when site administrators view a sites statistics, in versions up to and including 13.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2022-25149|2024-08-03T04:29:01.770Z -- wp%20statistics -- wp%20statistics
item.description: The WP Statistics WordPress plugin is vulnerable to SQL Injection due to insufficient escaping and parameterization of the IP parameter found in the ~/includes/class-wp-statistics-hits.php file which allows attackers without authentication to inject arbitrary SQL queries to obtain sensitive information, in versions up to and including 13.1.5.

item.title: CVE-2022-25305|2024-08-03T04:36:06.815Z -- wp%20statistics -- wp%20statistics
item.description: The WP Statistics WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting due to insufficient escaping and sanitization of the IP parameter found in the ~/includes/class-wp-statistics-ip.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts onto several pages that execute when site administrators view a sites statistics, in versions up to and including 13.1.5.
